title: Depression, stress and loneliness may impact Covid vaccines' efficacy: Research
author: Neetu Chandra Sharma
description: The research has highlighted that environmental factors, as well as an individual's genetics and physical and mental health, can weaken the body's immune system.Vaccines work by challenging the immune system, within hours of vaccination there is a general immune response as the body recognizes a potential biological threat
cleaned_text: 06:58 PM IST] Depression, stress and loneliness may impact Covid vaccines' efficacy: Research The research has highlighted that environmental factors, as well as an individual's genetics and physical and mental health, can weaken the body's immune system Vaccines work by challenging the immune system, within hours of vaccination there is a general immune response as the body recognizes a potential biological threat [] Depression, stress, loneliness, and poor health behaviors can weaken the body's immune system and lower the effectiveness of new [covid-19 vaccines](https://www.livemint.com/science/news/covid19-vaccine-serum-institute-of-india-expects-who-emergency-approval-for-covishield-soon-11610622303794.html) that are in development and the early stages of global distribution, a new research by the Ohio State University, [USA](https://www.livemint.com/news/world/us-vaccine-rollout-hindered-by-faulty-coordination-messaging-11610017779683.html) has indicated.
